channel.description: Ruby on Rails, Devops and more

item.title: Tab management in Kitty terminal
item.description:
üê±

  • ctrl shift + t: new tab
  • cmd shift + i: change tab title
  • shift + tab: next tab
  • ctrl shift + tab: previous tab

item.title: How to open Alfred preferences window?
item.description: ‚åò + , to open Alfred preferences window

item.title: Describe table in PostgresQL
item.description:
SELECT 
   table_name, 
   column_name, 
   data_type,
   is_nullable
FROM 
   information_schema.columns
WHERE 
   table_name = 'compensations';

item.title: Git clone with submodules
item.description:
https://stackoverflow.com/a/4438292

$ git clone --recursive -j8 repository_url

item.title: How to cyclically ping to an API endpoint using Github action
item.description:
• Create a cron-job github action with the following content: ```yaml name: Cron jobs on: schedule:
    • cron: ‚Äò0 */1 * * *‚Äô # every hour workflow_dispatch: # can handly trigger on Actions page jobs: lobsterss: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps:
      • name: curl uses: wei/curl@master with: args: https://lobsters-bot.vercel.app/api/index\?channels=go\&channels=ruby\&channels=web\&channels=security\&channels=programming\&channels=networking\&channels=linux ```

item.title: Kitty terminal repeats the command in output
Multiple export with dot
item.description:
Do you want to use Sidebar.Item instead of SidebarItem?

import Siderbar from './sidebar';
import Item from './sidebar-item';

export default Object.assign(Sidebar, { Item });

item.title: lazyloading images
item.description:
L√†m th·∫ø n√†o ƒë·ªÉ lazy load img? What: lazy load nghƒ©a l√† m√¨nh kh√¥ng load resource n√†o ƒë√≥ tr∆∞·ªõc khi m√¨nh th·∫≠t s·ª± c·∫ßn ƒë·∫øn ch√∫ng. Why: Page load time t·ªët h∆°n, ti·∫øt ki·ªám ƒë∆∞·ª£c bandwidth, tr·∫£i nghi·ªám ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng m∆∞·ª£t h∆°n. How: Legacy: Thay v√¨ set url ·ªü src , chuy·ªÉn th√†nh attribute data-src . G√°n class foo cho c√°c img c·∫ßn lazy load. On scroll, resize, orientation change, ch·ªçn .foo , d·ª±a v√†o offset ho·∫∑c boundingRect ƒë·ªÉ x√°c ƒë·ªãnh img ƒëang n·∫±m trong viewport -> switch data-src th√†nh src ƒë·ªÉ ti·∫øn h√†nh load v√† remove class. Modern: T∆∞∆°ng t·ª± nh∆∞ tr√™n, nh∆∞ng d√πng Intersection Observer API ƒë·ªÉ observe v√† trigger load (Kh√¥ng support IE) Pitfalls: Layout Reflow: Do img ch∆∞a ƒë∆∞·ª£c load c√≥ height b·∫±ng 0 (v√† width c√≥ th·ªÉ ch∆∞a x√°c ƒë·ªãnh) n√™n khi img ƒë∆∞·ª£c load, n√≥ s·∫Ω trigger reflow (page content ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·∫Øp x·∫øp l·∫°i ƒë·ªÉ nh∆∞·ªùng ch·ªó cho img v·ª´a ƒë∆∞·ª£c load). Vi·ªác n√†y ngo√†i g√¢y ra tr·∫£i nghi·ªám ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng k√©m th√¨ n√≥ c√≤n ·∫£nh h∆∞·ªüng ƒë·ªÉ performance, v√¨ khi trigger reflow th√¨ browser s·∫Ω trigger qu√° tr√¨nh calculate layout v√† rendering pipeline ph√≠a sau ƒë√≥ n·ªØa. Solution: D√πng placeholder ƒë·ªÉ th·∫ø ch·ªó cho img ch∆∞a ƒë∆∞·ª£c load. N·∫øu bi·∫øt dimension, c√≥ th·ªÉ set fixed dimension cho container. N·∫øu bi·∫øt ƒë∆∞·ª£c aspect ratio, c√≥ th·ªÉ d√πng inline placeholder b·∫±ng png ho·∫∑c svg, hay th·∫≠m ch√≠ l√† CSS. Nh∆∞ng kh·ªèe nh·∫•t v√† x·ªãn nh·∫•t th√¨ d√πng Low-quality image placeholders (LQIPs), c√°i n√†y nhi·ªÅu asset source s·∫Ω generate ra s·∫µn khi b·∫°n upload, c√≤n kh√¥ng c√≥ th√¨ h√£y ƒëi v·∫≠n ƒë·ªông h√†nh lang ƒë·ªÉ c√≥ :vayvay: No javascript: L∆∞u √Ω c·∫ßn cung c·∫•p fallback (noscript) trong tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng t·∫Øt js ho·∫∑c kh√¥ng load ƒëc js v·∫´n c√≥ th·ªÉ th·∫•y ƒë∆∞·ª£c img. C√°i n√†y c≈©ng c√≥ issue c·ªßa ri√™ng n√≥, nh∆∞ng c√≥ l·∫Ω s·∫Ω ƒë·ªÅ c·∫≠p ·ªü m·ªôt post n√†o ƒë√≥ kh√°c.

item.title: JAVA_HOME and libexec/java_home
item.description:
Get the list of available JDKs

$ /usr/libexec/java_home -V
Matching Java Virtual Machines (5):
    15.0.1, x86_64:     "OpenJDK 15.0.1"        /Users/namtx/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/openjdk-15.0.1/Contents/Home
    13.0.5, x86_64:     "Zulu 13.35.17" /Users/namtx/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/azul-13.0.5/Contents/Home
    11.0.9.1, x86_64:   "Zulu 11.43.55" /Users/namtx/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/azul-11.0.9.1/Contents/Home
    1.8.0_275, x86_64:  "AdoptOpenJDK 8"        /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/adoptopenjdk-8.jdk/Contents/Home
    1.8.0_272, x86_64:  "Zulu 8.50.0.21"        /Users/namtx/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/azul-1.8.0_272/Contents/Home

/Users/namtx/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/openjdk-15.0.1/Contents/Home

Specific JDK version by libexec/java_home

$ export JAVA_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home -v 11.0.9.1)

$ java -version
openjdk version "11.0.9.1" 2020-11-04 LTS
OpenJDK Runtime Environment Zulu11.43+55-CA (build 11.0.9.1+1-LTS)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Zulu11.43+55-CA (build 11.0.9.1+1-LTS, mixed mode)
